subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Four years after a debilitating illness endangered his career and two years after fans wanted him fired for missing the N.C.A.A. tournament for consecutive seasons, Don Lucia has led Minnesota’s hockey team to a No. 1 ranking.
snippet: Four years after a debilitating illness endangered his career and two years after fans wanted him fired for missing the N.C.A.A. tournament for consecutive seasons, Don Lucia has led Minnesota’s hockey team to a No. 1 ranking.
